dt-option.name: autoFill.enable

type.description: * `true` - AutoFill is enabled when the DataTable is created * `false` - AutoFill is not enabled, and can later be enabled via the API.

dt-option.description: It can be useful to disable AutoFill's user input controls at certain times, depending on the state of your application. This option provides that ability when the table is initially created, while the `-api autoFill().enable()` and `-api autoFill().disable()` methods provide the option to enabling the user interaction after the table has been created.
